task.title: Remove Existing Typewriter Ribbon
task.shortdesc: When you are changing the ribbon of your typewriter, you will need to remove the existing typewriter ribbons.

taskbody.prereq: Before removing the ribbons, you will need to remove the ribbon cover on your typewriter.

step.cmd: Pull back one of the spring-loaded ribbon arms and lift the ribbon spool from its respective ribbon spool shaft.
step.info: Repeat for the second ribbon spool.

step.cmd: Locate the set of ribbon guides that are in front of the ribbon vibrator.
Carefully unthread the existing ribbon through the small slits in the ribbon guides.
